creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry L. Chisholm
description: One of three pieces Duchesse and Rose Point lace with a flamboyant, scrolling design of leaves and blossoms. The pattern is grounded with Pill0w-made brides. Inserted at intervals alon the lower edge and gorming part of the border,are single blossoms worked in needlepoint, and edged with a needle point reseau.
medium: Linen?; Duchesse and Rose Point lace
title: Border
